aslib.cli

Class StdIn

  • java.lang.Object
    • aslib.cli.StdIn

  • public class StdIn
extends java.lang.Object

    Contains the functions responsible for capturing certain data type from the command line.

    Since:
    6.1
    Version:
    2019-05-03
    Author:
    Adriano Siqueira
